name: SMM - manager
description:
If you’d like to join an inspiring and energetic MarCom team at a fast-growing innovative high-tech company, you’re on the right way.

Innotech (part of T1 Group)

Since 2020 Innotech is providing leading-edge software solutions for the banking industry. We are a technology partner of VTB Group in Russia, and are actively expanding across overseas markets including Middle East, Africa and Southeast Asia.

What tasks you will be working at:

  • Develop creative and engaging social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engage the target audience
  • Manage the day-to-day handling of all social media channels such as LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter and YouTube, adapting content to suit different channels
  • Manage and facilitate social media communities by responding to social media posts and developing discussions
  • Form key relationships with influencers across the social media platforms
  • Develop personal accounts of the company's top managers
  • Monitor mentions of the company in social networks, analyze SMM channels of competitors, search for relevant news
  • Learn and use new social media tools to increase audience engagement
  • Collaborate with designers to create graphic and multimedia content
  • Popularize social networks among company employees and increase their engagement
  • Monitor, track, analyse and report on performance on social media platforms using tools such as Google Analytics and Facebook insights

What skills you will need to have:

  • A solid understanding of the use of a range of social media platforms, particularly in relation to advertising/branding and customers
  • Strong copywriting and editing skills suitable for each platform, from knowing how to write a successful tweet to using effective storytelling techniques
  • Online community management and customer service skills to strike the balance between publicity and stimulating direct discussion with potential and actual customers
  • Strong communication skills to communicate with colleagues at various job levels for comments and interviews
  • Knowledge and understanding of SMM algorithms and search engine optimisation
  • Skills in data analysis and interpreting statistics

What our requirements are:

  • BA/MA degree in advertisement, marketing, public relations etc.
  • 5+ years of experience in SMM management (preferably in IT sector).
  • Native Russian speaker. Advanced / Proficiency level of English is a must.
  • Knowledge of fintech/ banking sector would be your advantage.

What C&B we can offer you:

  • Exciting job in one team with MarCom professionals of diverse expertise in IT
  • Attractive salary
  • Medical insurance (after completing three months of probation period), incl. dentist care
  • Multiple benefits from partners (access to e-library, discounts on language courses, fitness centers, hotels etc)
